numbered_ace_sentences: 2. Legacy status affects the admission rate.
3. If a person has high wealth and has legacy status then the admission rate is high.
4. If a person has neither wealth nor legacy status then the admission rate is high.
5. There is no middle case between these two cases.
6. There is a stigma about having money and having legacy status.
7. There is a stigma about having neither money nor legacy status.
8. I ask where this stigma came from.
9. I ask whether admission is about both wealth and legacy status.
10. I ask whether admission is only about wealth.
11. I ask whether rich people use donations to reduce taxes.
12. I am an up-and-coming college applicant.
13. It is valuable for me to see my category.
14. I think about how I compare with other applicants.
17. Colleges look for an all-or-nothing case.
